articles.title: Zayn Malik seventh in Sunday Times' Young Musicians Rich List - Bradford Telegraph and Argus
articles.description: ZAYN Malik has been named in the top 10 richest young musicians in the world.
articles.content:
ZAYN Malik has been named in the top 10 richest young musicians in the world.
The East Bowling-born singer is worth a cool £36 million, which puts him in seventh place in the Sunday Times Rich List.
However, the 27-year-old is lagging behind former One Dire… [+2410 chars]

articles.description: On his fifth album, Perfume Genius turns away from ‘big US rock’ to create something altogether more intimate, pop veterans Sparks return with a record as multi-faceted as it is innovative, and Moses Sumney offers vulnerable introspection
articles.content:
